title: Destination Detail: Add Hotels/Airbnb lodging and Local Transport sections

requirements.summary: Extend the Destination Detail “Where to Stay” content with explicit Hotels and Airbnb lodging subsections in English, matching existing Card/card-glow styling.
acceptanceCriteria: On the destination detail route (/destinations/$slug), the content includes clearly labeled lodging subsections that explicitly mention “Hotels” and “Airbnb”.
All user-facing text added for these sections is in English.
The new lodging content matches the existing visual system (Card/card-glow, typography scale, spacing) used elsewhere on the page.

file_operations.description: Update the existing “Where to Stay” section to include dedicated, clearly headed subsections for “Hotels” and “Airbnb” (alongside the current homestays/guesthouses content), using existing shadcn/ui Card composition patterns (Card/CardHeader/CardTitle/CardContent), existing spacing/typography, and keeping all added guidance text in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a new “Local Transport” section on Destination Detail pages with Rent a Bike and Cab/Taxi options, using MotionReveal, Cards, icons, and placeholder CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section titled “Local Transport” appears on the destination detail page as part of the main content flow.
The section includes at minimum: (1) Rent a Bike and (2) Cab/Taxi options, each described with short, scannable text.
Any CTAs in this section are placeholders (non-navigating), consistent with the existing AffiliateCtaPlaceholder behavior.
The section is visually consistent with existing sections and uses the existing motion/reveal pattern (MotionReveal) like other sections on the page.

file_operations.description: Insert a new main-flow section titled “Local Transport” (wrapped in MotionReveal) that presents at least two Card-based options: “Rent a Bike” and “Cab/Taxi”, each with a relevant icon and short scannable guidance text, and optional non-navigating placeholder CTAs implemented via the existing AffiliateCtaPlaceholder component (no real booking links or tracking). Use existing Card/card-glow styling and separators to match the page’s visual system. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
